caption: Amazing pizza! We were looking for a solid pie and found this awesome spot. The flavors are so unique and the crust is thin, airy and well-done! Perfect flavor combination and texture. Too bad we were visiting from out of state otherwise this would have been our new go-to pizza spot!
Love Otto's cheese pizza! Yummy
I love their simple slices
Their mashed potato bacon scallion pizza will change your life for the better. I’ll never be the same. 🙏🙏
epic pizza 🍕!
We ate at two different OTTO locations during our stay in Portland because the pizza was so good.
Best pizza in Maine hands down!

We ordered a large pepperoni mushroom pizza for pick up and it was GOOOD. Very rarely would I rate a takeout pizza as "exceeded expectations" but this one did it. They also timed my pizza down to the minute! I showed up 2 minutes earlier than my requested pickup time, and I waited exactly 2 minutes for my pizza to be ready. Super fresh and super good.
The pizza was awesome and staff friendly. Parking on the street was easy.

Finding a place to eat without waiting in line during this pandemic seemed more difficult than expected. Luckily, I had Otto earmarked for a pizza place to take our kids. We passed on seafood and opted for pizza instead and it did not disappoint! Seated right away and the pizza had a great thin crust!

Cute and cozy pizza place in Portland, Maine.y husband and I stopped here after a long day of exploring and shopping in the Portland area. We tried two of their brick oven pizza and enjoyed both! The chicken basil had the perfect amount of toppings and I enjoyed every bite. The pulled pork, pepperoni, sausage was a meatlovers dream. I would definitely go back.

Settled on Otto because they have so many more vegan options than Flatbread, Bonobo and Portland Pie (but they're good too!) I got the gluten free 12", which I assume is vegan since it's listed as an option in the vegan menu (Portland Pie's gf crust has egg.) Ordered the mushroom cauliflower, light on the cheese. I rarely eat pizza as I'm whole food plant based and don't often get anything processed. So this was a treat. The crust is thinner and crisper than Flatbread's, and yummy. Overall, I'm happy with my choice. I'm the type when I make pizza at home load on the toppings heavily to maximize veggies. I have yet to find a pizza place that does this (Portland Pie comes closest.) I'll definitely return to Otto though. Husband had the veggie special which was easily made vegan by swapping out the cheese (sweet potato polenta - very light on the small bits of polenta.) We got take out and called in the order as there was no place online to make note of an allergy. Prices are very reasonable for vegan and gf upgrades. Atmosphere is really cute, and when I feel more comfortable we will definitely dine in. Easy to find street parking. And a perfect location to walk over to Sticky Sweet after for ice cream!
Otto's has some of the best topping combinations in town. If they only had a better crust I'd be here far too often.
Really good pizza place, there's something for everyone! Staff is super friendly!
Great quality and very fast.
Great service and food
Very Nice pizza at decent price.
Great pizza, affordable prices, fast service, and friendly staff! Highly recommend!
Mashed potato, bacon and scallion pizza is delicious! Crust is great too.
Good pizza and beer. Very good service. This is the Covid menu.
Inventive pizzas, always a neat and creative special, and easily the best thin crust pizza in Portland.
Great vegan pizza!
Had ranch! ‘‘Twas great!
Always amazing
The Best Pizza
Great service with very accommodating staff.  Unique menu with great food choices.
Great tasting pizza, very friendly service. The art they had on the walls was pretty funny as well
How about not having the front counter girl harass customers about forgetting a facemask when all the cooks out back aren't wearing them. They do nothing anyways
$25.50 LG,,NEED A MAGNIFINE GLASS TO FIND THE TOPPINGS 60 BUCKS FOR A DELIVERY WITH GRUBHUB COLD
Very good food and the staff nice and friendly. Will go again  and again.
Best wood fired pizza in the Portland area!
I loooove Otto's pizza! The mashed potato pizza is to die for. They have a good tap selection too.
Best pizza in Portland!
Outstanding pizza, fast, courteous service. The best slice in Portland hands down.
Good stuff!!
Love your pizza
Absolutely amazing pizza, best in the city by far and also great service! A must try!

caption: Great pizza with gluten-free crust options. Simple, tasty menu.
Always awesome.... amended.... Bad experience with last pizza. Very disappointed- overcooked and micro-thin. Not right at all.
Service was great, attentive without creating discomfort, really enjoyed the food and the decor

Super yummy spot! Their GF pizza option is super tasty as well — just wish they had at least one GF option available by the slice for folks who don’t want a whole pizza to themselves. Otherwise a great place to stop by with the family on a weekend afternoon.
Awes as usual.
Pizza was great extremely impressed solid 7.9 out of 10
The gluten free pizza was absolutely delicious. Staff was a bit... odd. Not a problem though because the food is perfect.
Good pizza good service, almost too nice
Amazing pizza and beer. The hype is REAL!!!!

Pizza, as always, was very tasty. There is a good selection of beers on tap. The store is on the ground floor of the building with plenty of free standing tables for wheelchair access. Service was friendly and attentive. The atmosphere is fun.
Good pizza
Great pizza and beer! Very friendly staff!
Delicious. Potato pizza on point.
Yummy pizza and great beer. Best combo! LoL
Fantastic pizza, chill atmosphere.
We had the margarita pizza and the mash potatoes. Awesome. Recommended
The best pizza ever, you can't go wrong here!   Enjoy!!
This Pizza has the best crispy baked dough I have ever tasted. The prices are very reasonable and the staff is friendly.
Great sauce!
Excellent food
Pizza was good.  Had the potato, bacon, and scallion.  Looks like they have a decent selection of creative pies.  Will have to try them again in the future.
The pizza was good but the meatballs were pretty bland. The place wasn't busy when we arrived so we got seating right away.
Great pizza, wonderful service and warm, welcoming atmosphere.
Best pie in the state.
Great service, excellent Detroit style pizza. And the bartender even gave us recommendations for other places in town to visit.
Best pie slices eva!
The GF pizza crust was a little tough and all of the pizzas at our table lacked enough sauce. The kids meal pizza was nearly all bread.

(Translated by Google) Excellent pizza! Large portions, we brought a lot of food back home! The atmosphere was not exceptional, probably because we were there on a Wednesday night.  (Original) Excellente pizza! Grandes portions, nous avons rapporté beaucoup de nourriture à la maison! L’ambiance n’était pas exceptionnelle, sans doute parce que nous y étions un mercredi soir.
Good, thin crust, soft pizza, not heavy on toppings Not bad, not great Interesting soda dispenser
Pizza by the slice very tasty!
Great pizza, by the pie and by the slice!

Unique pizzas with outstanding taste. I love grabbing a slice late night. Ordering delivery on family night at home. Going to the restaurant on a Saturday afternoon well out with the family. Not a better pizza place in town
My favorite!
Great service and staff in a nice setting.  The pizza is just OK and the salads are premade and are served iced-cold from the refrigerator.  Our margherita pizza tasted like a frozen pie.
The staff was very nice, and the pizzas were HUGE!

I have been to two other of their locations but I have to say I love the older feel of this place. They have outdoor seating and parking isn't too bad in the area. I was lucky enough to have Kelsey today because she was awesome. Super friendly and checked in to make sure I was good while I took my time enjoying a yummy kolsch beer. I was excited to see that on the menu since I just had kolsch in Germany. Pizza was amazing as always. If you didn't think mashed potatoe and bacon could be awesome on a pizza you are wrong. I have to admit my favorite is how crispy it is. Overall I definitely will come back just because the staff was so awesome. Kelsey made my afternoon trip for lunch that much better.
Very good pizza. Found the greek salad lacking ingredients and over priced, loved the pizza!
Great place to meet after work.
The best pizza ever!!
Absolutely awesome. Terrific pizza and Anna was the perfect server: cheerful, informative, attentive and a million-dollar smile. Highly recommend, and our family will be back for certain!

Love this pizza! Whether by the slice from the counter on the right, or sit down at the bar or tables through the door on the left - locals and tourists love this spot. Their mashed potato, bacon & scallion is a go to for so many! Happy hour specials.
Great Cobb salad. 1st Pizza failed in the oven. 2nd was okay. They were very nice about it. Does not compare to Spacco Napoli.
Good
Happy hour is the bomb, buy a piece of pizza and get a beer, or vice versa. What's not to love! Staff is incredibly friendly and the pizza is a very thin crunchy crust.

Excellent pizza and atmosphere
Great pizza. So yummy. Good beer selection. Not too sure about untouchable piano string decor at booths. : D  Way too much temptation. :P

This review is not about the slices themselves (which I would give a 4-star) but about the management. The management’s rewards program (buy 10 slices get 1 free) is a total rip-off: you can buy 10 slices in one sitting, but they will only count that as 1-slice.  In the future, I will not be returning to this Otto’s location. I will be going to the other locations that do, in fact, honor their so-called “rewards.”
Incredible award winning pizza
Pretty good pizza. I enjoyed it. Nothing to write home about, but definitely tasty.
Some of the most unique pizzas in town. Try the mashed potato bacon scallion!

The pizza is just OK... I prefer Pizzaiolo on Cumberland Ave ... downtown. Trendy and unusual pizza combinations can be interesting, but sometimes over thought... the pizza dough is too often tough and brittle. GO TO PIZZAIOLO FOR THE REAL DEAL 😋🍕🍕🍕🍕🍕

Love this place.  They have fantastic artisan flat bread style pizza with some great combos.  Tortolini pizza is fantastic and the mashed potato pizza is great too.  Go figure!

A great place to grab a quick slice. A little pricey than your regular pizza joint, but worth the price and worth the drive. Any trip to Portland isn't complete without Ottos. The potato, bacon, and leek pizza is absolutely out of this world!

Delicious!
Absolutely delicious, but costly.  This is a place you go when you truly love pizza and are willing to pay for the best.
Pizza was original and phenomenal, brick oven pizza is always a go to. Service was down to earth and professional, drinks on draft were craft and wine listing was perfect for the occasion.

Best pizza in Portland, Maine.  Been coming here since they were only selling slices on middle Congress St.  Several locations. The dough is all the same but the cooking prowess varies from location to location.  This one never disappoints. Great selection of local beer on tap.
Great pizza!
Great selection of pizza and local beers
Good pizza, great pizza
Good, fast, but not cheap.  The triangle is elusive.  So ok, you pay for  quality
Delicious pizza! Very reasonably priced.
Excellent pizza with casual atmosphere to match
The atmosphere was fun, service was superb, and pizza delicious!!

Been going for ages.  Recently, they have eliminated the perennial favorite with roasted garlic-kalamata olives and red peppers; replaced it with newer over-cheesed cauliflower-mushroom pizza (way too much).  Plain cheese and tomato pizza is still OK.  They literally had someone cleverly write up a disclaimer for the menu: "Our pizzas a crafted each individually, we do not offer 1/2 pie topping options."  They just want to sell you more slightly-overpriced whole pies.  Last time we went in, the service was fawning and disruptive, with unnecessary check-ins every 2 minutes.  Our waiter referred us to the 1/2 pizza legalese, and it sounded pretentious as soon as it was read out loud.  Otto's seems to be getting more and more precious each time we go.  This restaurant has, perhaps jumped the shark.
Margarita pizza with vegan cheese. Delicious!!
...it's a pizza joint, they may think their cooler than they are but when it comes right down to it, it's just another (expensive) pizza joint
This place is amazing and has a wide variety in drinks and pizzas. Verry atmospheric

So this is a chain restaurant, when we called the staff confirmed their location and took our order. Once we arrived at the location specified we were told we ordered at the wrong location and they would not serve us.
Reliably good pizza,  good variety, friendly staff.
Their pizza is amazing!  As a native New Yorker, I am skeptical of pizza outside the tri-state area, but I wiill go to OTTO time and time again.  Tortellini pie is my favorite!
Good detroit style pizza
Great service and good pizza!
Had a Margherita pizza slice, nice tomatoes, light on mozzarella and heavy on oil. Ehh
My favorite pizza in town. Otto's variety never fails my hungry stomach.
Old school, laid back atmosphere with great service and great pizza.  A great selection of beer too
Liam Gibbons our waiter was fantastic and so was the pizza!
Excellent pizza, the employees were very pleasant and helpful, prices are very reasonable.
Stood at the please wait to be seated area for 9 minutes.  Although staff passed by, no one acknowledged our presence.  Walked out.  Maybe they were understaffed or something.

While I've enjoyed their pizza for years, I tried the falafel sliders for the first time and LOVED them. Looking forward to exploring the other options on their menu. They also always have a great selection of local beers!

I want to like this chain and support it because it's local, but to be completely honest: Their pizza is thinner than cardboard and often overcooked, the toppings are sparse and the prices are quite inflated (for what you get). The two things I do enjoy about Otto's is the staff and their choice of wine.  I'm sorry, but I find my money is better spent supporting another local pizza chain.
great service

I got a slice of the mashed potato, bacon, and scallion; it was good. I would recommend.
Good pizzas to take away(out in America English)

I only went here a couple of times and found that the pizza, while tasting pretty good when eating it, made me and my family sick every single time we had it. I will note that each time we ordered from OTTO, we had chicken on the pizza. I’m not sure if that was the issue or not, but it seems the most likely culprit. I don’t think we will be heading back another time.

Otto Pizza is a Portland gem! The 225 Congress location offers indoor and outdoor seating.  Our server was cheerful, efficient, and attentive. We ordered a gluten-free pizza with pepperoni, bacon, and sausage for $22 including tax. We would eat here again in a heartbeat!
Love their pizza. It's dangerous how close I live to it.

(Translated by Google) Pizzeria offering a nice atmosphere and pizza ... Wow! People who know how to do things with great ingredients. Lots of originality on the menu. Try the pizza with mashed potatoes, bacon and shallots .... I know it's weird but you're going to screw up. The little walk outside the city center is definitely worth it.  (Original) Pizzeria offrant une belle ambiance et la pizza...Wow! Des gens qui savent faire les choses avec d'excellents ingrédients. Beaucoup d'originalité au menu.Essayez la pizza aux patates pilées, bacon et échalotes....Je sais c'est bizarre mais vous allez capoter.La petite marche en dehors du centre-ville en vaut vraiment la peine.
Very good and affordable pizza, my only complaint is that a 12oz beer was $8.
Who would think to put tortellini on a pizza? These guys. Love the classic miccucci slab, but if you don’t want carb overload you get the thin crust slices at Otto

This place was amazing. The server was very attentive and prompt. They have small vases they bring you extra water in and he refilled ours 4 times. Food was fast and insanely delicious. We got the mashed potato, bacon and scallions pizza - highly recommend!

Good pizza, good service, great beer selection.
Bizarre but amazing pizza combinations. Well-known Portland spot!

Not happy about the service today. Not at all. We just hitched up to the bar and grabbed a couple of brews but it took almost 20 MINUTES to get ONE slice of pepperoni pizza. Come on guys! It's a slice bar!! I know you are not on a schedule but other people are and this was a very important schedule to keep.
Friendly staff. Fast service in early afternoon. Pizza: Potato, bacon, scallion 4.5/5 Fries, hand cut 4/5 Root beer 3/5 Would eat here again.
Gourmet thin crust pizza by the slice or by the pie, plus a fantastic selection of draft beers and a friendly atmosphere - what's not to like?
Great food, great service, great vibe. We're going back.

Delicious artisan pizza that's also filling. Love their weekly specials. Once had pulled pork pizza that had corn bread on it! Of course, the mashed potato, scallion, bacon pizza is a Portland institution. But I think their plain pepperoni is even quite fantastics.
Amazing pizza for a great price. Staff was polite and very pleasant and showed up in half the time they originally quoted.

I used to get pizza slices there all the time. My daughter introduced me to the mashed potato,bacon, and scallions. Sometimes it was hot and sometimes it was lukewarm or cold. Still it was great pizza and I miss it now that we don't live near it.
Munjoy Hill, our favorite OTTOS. Staff is awesome. Pizza comes out fast, always delicious.
Great thin crust pizza with interesting booth decor
Pizza good
(Translated by Google) Delicious afff  (Original) Delicious afff

Cool atmosphere. These include interesting furnishing elements such as: piano keys along the back of the bar, hidden track lighting above the tables, what seems like randomly selected or reclaimed wood slat tables with iron legs, and small oil lamp candles on every table. This was our first visit, so my wife and I ordered 2 small pizzas to try 2 different flavors in 1 visit. My wife ordered the chicken and caramelized pear and I got the tomato, salami, and scallion pie. Both were delicious! The crust is thin and has a homemade texture (probably is made with good ingredients in-house). We also enjoyed the bottle of Root Beer that comes from Maine Root, a local distributor that uses good ingredients for their beverages. According to their pie menu, they try to source meats and veggies from Maine farms as well. I appreciate those efforts and the flavors of the drink and pies showed through. Although we didn't use the service, you can just walk in to buy pizza by the slice as well. Nifty idea I think.
Best pizza
Awesome - not run of the mill pizza
Interesting yet delicious combinations.
Otto have the best pizza
Casual, rustic atmosphere. Great service. Excellent selection of wines and spirits. Fantastic thin crust pizza. Oh so good!
Good pizza and beer. Fast, friendly service.
Delicious. The mashed potato scallion is great

The pizza was good, beer selection was OK, and the service wasn't very good. It was almost empty, but it took a long time to get drinks, the check, and our server seemed annoyed that she had customers

We have eaten pizza in hundreds of restaurants in scores of cities (including Pizzeria Bianco in Phoenix and 2 Amys in Washington DC) and NONE are better than Otto.  Consistently remarkable food, excellent beverage choices with reasonable pricing, and to top it off--- top notch service.  A traveler's delight!
Great thin crust pizza.
Amazing Pizza! Loved the barbecue pulled pork and breakfast pizza. Good service and amazing decor
Pizza ok. Nothing special. Delivery 1 hr 40 min. 50 min estimate.
Loved the variety of pizzas! The great atmosphere and service helped to make a memorable experience.
Love this Pizza. Thin crust, great sauce, choice toppings (love the sausage and Vivaldi onion) and cooked to perfection. Reasonable prices and great service.  Full service bar.
We had the mash potato, bacon scallion and the onion sausage pizza... great

Consistently quality pizza with a crispy, cornmeal-infused crust. Typically heavy on sauce(sauce is good) and light-ish on cheese, if you’re a full-coverage kind of pizza lover. Nothing you can’t tweak to taste and lots to love.
Great pizza, cool building, fun city

Loved the pizza and drinks! Will def go again!
Good pizza and beer, and the staff is very friendly.
First stop on a vacation from Pennsylvania. And it was amazing. Great service and even better food. Who puts whole cloves of garlic on pizza? These guys, and it's good.
Great crust and creative toppings, kid friendly
Great beers and great pizza 👍
